item.description: If you'll be in town, please come join us for some writing exercises! Write about your year, write about next year, write about 14 years into the future if you wish! If you have ideas about exercises you would enjoy, bring them. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be upstairs, either in the back or in the front, depending on where I can find seats!
item.name: Goodbye, 2009!: Writing Exercises
